physics.name: Sidhant Chaliha
physics.bio: Sidhant Chaliha is a graduated senior from BASIS Independent Silicon Valley and a rising freshman at Princeton University, studying physics and mathematics. He has taken all of the AP Physics exams offered, has scored numerous bronze medals at the US Physics Olympiad, and he considers himself a lifelong student of physics, with the belief that it holds the deepest possible description of nature.

physics.name: Brianna Zhang
physics.bio: Brianna Zheng is a rising senior at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley. She has taken all of the physics APs, receiving 5s on AP Physics 1, AP Physics 2, and hopefully AP Physics C: Mechanics and AP Physics C: Electricity and Magnetism. She received an Honorable Mention at the United States Physics Olympiad. She hopes to share the beauty of physics and its connection to everyday occurrences with others.

physics.name: Lucas Quan
physics.bio: Lucas Quan is a rising sophomore at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley. He has taken AP Physics 1 and probably got a 5. He has received the same number of USAPhO gold medals as Professor Sidhant Chaliha. He was also on the BISV science bowl team B as a physics main.

chemistry.name: Derrick Liu
chemistry.bio: Derrick Liu graduated from BASIS Independent Silicon Valley and is a rising sophomore at Johns Hopkins University, studying chemical engineering. He has taken Honors Chemistry, AP Chemistry, and college-level introductory and inorganic chemistry and excelled in all courses. Derrick also has extensive tutoring experience, having been a teaching assistant for introductory chemistry at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley and a mathematics tutor at AlphaStar academy.

chemistry.name: Emily Dai
chemistry.bio: Emily Dai graduated from BASIS Independent Silicon Valley and is a rising sophomore at UC Berkeley studying chemistry. She has taken Honors Chemistry, AP Chemistry, and college-level introductory chemistry. Emily has tutored high schoolers at Berkeley High School and will be a tutor for the UC Berkeley Peer Tutoring Center in the fall.

chemistry.name: Nathan Zhao
chemistry.bio: Nathan Zhao is a rising junior at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley. He has achieved gold for duos and bronze for team in the Berkeley Chemistry Tournament (BCT). He has also received a 5 on AP Chemistry.

biology.name: Ivan Zhang
biology.bio: Ivan Zhang graduated from BASIS Independent Silicon Valley and is a rising freshman at UC Berkeley studying Molecular and Cell Biology. Ivan has completed Honors Biology and Honors Chemistry, and self-studied AP Biology and AP Chemistry. His dedication to the life sciences led him to become a USABO semi-finalist. During high school, Ivan headed the Biology and Economics clubs and organized a Biology Bowl for middle school students. Additionally, he served as a teaching assistant for introductory chemistry at BASIS Independent Silicon Valley.

economics.name: Jack Xu
economics.bio: Jack Xu is a graduated senior from William Fremd High School and a rising freshman at University of Michigan, studying Business Administration and Data Science through the Ross School of Business. He has taken and scored 5s on all of the AP Economics exams offered and spent his past year as an intern for his teacherâ€™s AP Macroeconomics class.

economics.name: Cindy Xue
economics.bio: Cindy Xue is a graduated senior from Torrey Pines High School and a rising freshman at University of California Berkeley Haas School of Business, studying Business Administration and Data Science. She scored a 5 in the AP Macroeconomics exam and excelled through the course.
